text:
Kienta under HIP is disappointing! Poor quality and workmanship, and lacking in good customer service.
Had a leak issue, which Kienta supervisor in charge said easy fix. After done, the leak was worse than ever! Tried to get them to rectify and was told a number of lies! In the end, they just totally stop replying, and I’m guessing it’s because they received payment for HIP so they don’t care anymore! Totally horrible!!
Excellent work done for my HIP. They were most accommodating even when I had minor requests following the HIP. The supervisors are most responsible and KUDOS to the team!
Nothing to complain on the company. They did a good job for my HIP in Joo Seng. Very profession in the work done.
Professional. Well there is this person i would like to commend though. He worked tirelessly exhanging all the clothes-hanging struts, all by himself.
They are developer, owner and builder. Family owned business.
